text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS The US got the most COVID19 deaths in the world with POC having higher death rate than whites. 40 million ppl lost their jobs but the rich got $400 billion richer. Asians and blacks are brutalized on a daily basis but the prez supports white supremacy. America needs a revolution.
